titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that United States Armed Forces should be withdrawn from Somalia as expeditiously as possible.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H7382)
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Weldon. Petition No: 103-9.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Implores the President to withdraw U.S. armed forces from Somalia as expeditiously as possible.
